promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple wolf fire-type pokemon with orange and black fur. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or wolf. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Vulpernoir, a a massive simple wolf fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Continuous Fireball. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "wolf", "fire" or "Vulpernoir". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, wolf-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Vulpernoir, the blazing canine, thrives in arid landscapes. With its Continuous Fireball, it hunts prey by engulfing them in an inferno before dawn.
